entry.def: Karate is a Japanese sport or way of fighting in which people fight using their hands, elbows, feet, and legs.

means.word_mean: 1. a traditional Japanese system of unarmed combat; sharp blows and kicks are given to pressure-sensitive points on the body of the opponent
